edu.nyu.cs.connectfour.game.observer

Interface GameRecordObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChessPanel

    public interface GameRecordObserver
    Author:
    shenli

    A class can implement the GameRecordObserver interface when it wants to be informed of game record changes in GameRecordSubject objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void updateGameRecord(PlayerInfo playerInfo, int row, int column)
      This method is called whenever the observed object is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • updateGameRecord

        void updateGameRecord(PlayerInfo playerInfo,
                      int row,
                      int column)
        This method is called whenever the observed object is changed. An application calls a GameRecordSubject object's notifyGameRecordObservers method to have all the object's observers notified of the game record change.

        Parameters:
        playerInfo - a PlayerInfo object passed to the notifyGameRecordObservers method
        row - a row number passed to the notifyGameRecordObservers method
        column - a column number passed to the notifyGameRecordObservers method
